title.en: French for the Advanced Level II, B2.2 > C1.1
title.et: Prantsuse keel kõrgtasemele II, B2.2 > C1.1

description.en:
Le prérequis pour le cours est le niveau B2 du CECR. 
Le cours sera donné en français. Les étudiants devront parler en français pendant le cours. 
Une attention particulière sera portée sur la compréhension et l'expression orale. Quelques structures grammaticales seront aussi étudiées. 
Divers sujets concernant la culture francophone et l'actualité seront étudiés. Les documents authentiques seront utilisés aussi souvent que possible, pour habituer les étudiants à un français authentique.
description.et:
The course presupposes the Council of Europe Level B2.
The course will be given in French. Students are expected to speak French during the course as well. 
A particular focus will be given to the oral comprehension and expression. Some grammar structures will be studied as well.
Various topics related to french culture and the actuality will be studied during the semester. Authentic documents will be given as much as possible, in order to familiarize students to an authentic language.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to develop the oral as well as the writing skills in french. Students will learn how to express themselves more fluently and will improve their comprehension of the french language.
objectives.et: Le but du cours est de développer les compétences orales et écrites en français et également de les entretenir. Les étudiants apprendront comment s'exprimer de façon plus naturelle et amélioreront leur compréhension de la langue française.

learning_outcomes.en: By the end of the level, students will be able to express themselves fluently in french. They will understand various and difficult texts in french. They will be able to speak without looking for vocabulary. The language can be used in an efficient manner in a social context as well as in a professionnal or an academic context. The speech is coherent and organized.
learning_outcomes.et: A la fin du niveau, les étudiants pourront s'exprimer couramment en français. Il comprendront des textes variés et difficiles. Il parleront sans chercher leurs mots. La langue sera utilisée de façon efficace, que ce soit dans un contexte social, professionnel ou académique. Le discours est organisé et cohérent.

notes.en:
If needed, the course is held online. There are no hybrid classes planned.
Be sure to pay attention to the registration cancellation deadline stated in the course outline.
If you have concerns or special needs affecting your studies, please inform the lecturer at the beginning of the semester.
If necessary, contact the University of Tartu counseling centre: https://ut.ee/en/content/psychological-counselling.
Requiring special conditions at the end of the semester is not acceptable.
